title: Add tower/cell handoff tracking and visualization
description:
Cell handoffs are a major cause of disruption. Need to track:

Features:
- Log all tower/cell ID changes with timestamp
- Track which cells user connects to over time
- Calculate time spent on each cell
- Detect rapid handoff patterns (ping-pong)
- Flag problematic cells (consistently poor performance)

UI:
- Cell history timeline
- Map visualization if coordinates available
- Handoff frequency stats
- Cell performance comparison

Integration with CellMapper for tower locations.

title: Build Grafana dashboards for signal monitoring
description:
Create dashboards showing:
- Signal quality gauges (RSRP, RSRQ, SINR, RSSI)
- Band/cell connection history
- Throughput and latency graphs
- Tower handoff timeline
- Alert status panel

title: Add speed test integration for throughput measurement
description:
User reports <10mbps despite good signal. Can't diagnose without measuring actual throughput.

Features:
- Manual speed test trigger button
- Automatic periodic tests (configurable interval)
- Record: download/upload speed, latency, jitter
- Correlate with signal metrics at test time
- History of all speed tests with conditions

Implementation options:
- Use speedtest-cli or fast-cli from server
- Or integrate browser-based measurement
- Store results in database with signal snapshot

Critical for proving signal != speed correlation.
close_reason: Speed test integration complete - frontend UI with manual test button, results display (download/upload/ping/jitter), signal-at-test correlation, and history view

title: Implement automatic disruption detection and event logging
description:
User reports frequent service disruptions. Need automatic detection:

Detection criteria:
- Signal drops (SINR < threshold)
- Registration state changes
- Tower/cell handoffs
- Rapid signal fluctuations
- Gateway unreachable events

Logging:
- Event type, timestamp, duration
- Signal metrics at time of event
- Before/after values for context
- Severity classification

UI:
- Event timeline/log view
- Disruption count and frequency stats
- Daily/hourly disruption patterns

title: Add time-of-day congestion analysis
description:
5G performance varies dramatically by time due to network congestion. Need:

Features:
- Hourly/daily performance heatmaps
- Identify peak congestion periods
- Track weekend vs weekday patterns
- Store metrics by hour-of-day for comparison
- Show when network is most/least congested

This helps:
- Plan usage around congestion
- Prove congestion issues to T-Mobile
- Identify if problem is tower overload vs signal

title: Extract and display advanced 5G metrics from gateway API
description:
The T-Mobile gateway API likely returns MORE data than we're showing. Need to:

Investigate and add:
- CQI (Channel Quality Indicator) - CRITICAL for throughput
- MCS (Modulation and Coding Scheme) - directly affects speed
- MIMO layers/rank - n41 supports 4x4 MIMO
- Carrier Aggregation status - combining bands
- Bandwidth allocation (MHz)
- Physical Cell ID (PCI)
- Timing Advance / distance to tower
- DL/UL EARFCN/ARFCN
- Connection mode (NSA vs SA)

These metrics explain WHY signal is good but speed is bad (e.g., low CQI due to interference, or only 2x2 MIMO active).

title: Enhance UI with longer history charts and better visualization
description:

Chart improvements:

- Zoomable/pannable charts
- Hover tooltips with exact values
- Annotation markers for events/disruptions
- Better chart library (Chart.js or similar)

Layout improvements:
- Tabbed interface for different views
- Dedicated views: Real-time, History, Analysis, Events
- Mobile-optimized responsive design
- Dark/light theme toggle

Performance:
- Efficient rendering for large datasets
- Downsampling for long time ranges

title: Build Go-based T-Mobile Gateway Prometheus Exporter
description:
Create a Go service that:
- Polls 192.168.12.1 gateway every 5 seconds
- Supports multiple gateway models (Arcadyan KVD21, Nokia, Sagemcom)
- Exports Prometheus metrics for: RSRP, RSRQ, SINR, RSSI, PCI, eNB, TAC, band info
- Auto-discovers available API endpoints
- Handles authentication if required

title: Generate diagnostic reports for T-Mobile support
description:
When reporting issues to T-Mobile, need evidence. Generate reports containing:

Report contents:
- Signal metrics summary (avg, min, max, std dev)
- Disruption event log
- Speed test history
- Time-of-day performance patterns
- Tower/cell connection history
- Screenshots of problem periods
- Correlation analysis results

Export formats:
- PDF report with charts
- CSV data export
- JSON for technical analysis

Include timestamps and duration of data collection.

title: Implement signal-to-speed correlation analysis
description:
The core diagnostic question: which signal metric predicts actual throughput?

Analysis features:
- Correlate each metric (SINR, RSRP, RSRQ, CQI) with speed test results
- Generate scatter plots and correlation coefficients
- Identify threshold values where performance degrades
- Show distribution of metrics during good vs bad performance
- ML-based anomaly detection for unusual patterns

Output:
- Dashboard showing which metrics matter most
- Automatic identification of problem conditions
- Evidence for T-Mobile support tickets

title: Implement Prometheus/Grafana alert rules for signal degradation
description:
Create alerting rules for:
- RSRP below threshold (-110 dBm warning, -120 dBm critical)
- SINR degradation
- Frequent tower handoffs
- Connection drops
- Configure alert notifications

title: Create Docker Compose for LGTM stack deployment
description:
Set up docker-compose.yml with:
- Grafana (dashboards, alerting)
- Loki (log aggregation)
- Tempo (tracing)
- Mimir (Prometheus-compatible metrics storage)
- Prometheus (scrape config for gateway exporter)
- Network configuration for local development

title: Add alerting system for degraded conditions
description:
Proactive notification when conditions degrade:

Alert types:
- Signal below threshold
- Multiple disruptions in time window
- Speed test below threshold
- Unusual metric patterns
- Gateway connection lost

Notification options:
- Browser notification
- Sound alert
- Visual indicator on dashboard
- Optional webhook for external integrations

Configurable thresholds and cooldown periods.

title: Add historical data persistence with SQLite
description:
Currently ALL data is lost on refresh. Need persistent storage to:
- Store signal metrics over days/weeks
- Track disruption events with timestamps
- Enable trend analysis and pattern detection
- Support long-term correlation with speed issues

Implementation:
- Add SQLite database (signal_history.db)
- Schema: timestamps, all signal metrics, tower/cell IDs
- Batch inserts for performance (every 5-10 seconds)
- Data retention policy (e.g., 30 days rolling)
- Migration from in-memory to persistent storage

This is FOUNDATIONAL for all diagnostic features.
